name: Komfovent v4.0.0
info:
Komfovent rekuperatoriaus automatika (v4.0.0)

Sudėtis:
• Pagrindinė valdymo logika (Decide Desired)
• Rate-based boost (CO₂ kilimo analizė)
• Vonios OVR (drėgmės prioritetas)
• STOP FLAGS hard block
• ARMED_AWAY režimas
• Windows guard (10 min)
• Auto-learning CO₂ threshold (aktyvios darbo dienos + 24h savaitgaliai)

Telemetrija:
• sensor.current_co2_rate
• binary_sensor.rate_boost_active
• sensor.komfovent_logic

Dokumentacija ir changelog:
→ GitHub README / CHANGELOG.md

name: Windows guard: arm 10m timer
Windows guard: apply long-open state
Force mode (test)
Get states (robust)
Decide desired
Branch: ARMED_AWAY boost trigger
Force OFF after armed boost
Normalize + build desired_key
Build Actions (array payload)
Prep: switch.turn_on
Prep: switch.turn_off
Prep: number.set_value
Prep: notify
Rate telemetry: log + HA sensors
Logikos režimas (CO2 / RATE / NIGHT / OVR ir t.t.)
